headline: Expedia Group, Inc. Announces Closing of a Public Offering of 5.400% Senior Notes due 2035
summary: SEATTLE, February 21, 2025--Expedia Group, Inc. ("Expedia Group" or the "Company") today announced that it has closed a registered public offering (the "Senior Notes Offering") of $1 billion aggregate principal amount of unsecured 5.400% Senior Notes due 2035 (the "Senior Notes"). The Senior Notes were issued at a price of 99.316% of the aggregate principal amount with a coupon of 5.400%. The Senior Notes are guaranteed by certain subsidiaries of Expedia Group.
